The order of being selected for a committee is not significant. Thus, the problem asks for combinations of 5 objects taken 3 at a time, n = 5, r = 3.

(a) all are boys.
(b) all are girls.
(c) there are 3 boys and 1 girl.
(d) the number of boys and girls as members are equal.
(e) at least 3 are girls.
Show Solution
(a) The committee needs 4 members to be chosen all from 7 boys. Thus, n = 7, r = 4.
(b) The committee needs 4 members to be chosen all from 10 girls. Thus, n = 10, r = 4.
(c) The committee needs 4 members of which 3 are boys and 1 girl. The 3 boys are to be chosen from 7 boys and 1 girl is to be chosen from 10 girls. Thus,
- number of ways that 3 boys are to be chosen from 7 boys.
- number of ways that 1 girl is to be chosen from 10 girls.
After which, apply FCP by multiplying the two combination results in order to get the desired result.
There are 35 different committees.

(d) The committee needs 4 members of which the number of boys and girls as members are equal and that requires 2 boys and 2 girls. The 2 boys are to be chosen from 7 boys and 2 girls are to be chosen from 10 girls. Thus,
- number of ways that 2 boys are to be chosen from 7 boys.
- number of ways that 2 girls are to be chosen from 10 girls.
After which, apply FCP by multiplying the two combination results in order to get desired result.
There are 945 different committees.

(e) Since the committee needs at least 3 girls to form a committee of 4 members, then the number of girls needed in the committee could either be 3 or 4. So, if there are 3 girls in the committee, then it needs 1 boy to complete the members in the committee
- apply the FCP to get the number of ways to form a committee with 3 girls and 1 boy
While if there are 4 girls in the committee, then, there is no need for the number of boys since the members in the committee are already complete.
- apply the FCP to get the number of ways to form a committee with 4 girls and 0 boys
After which, add the combination results to get the desired result.
There are 1,050 different committees.
